comments:
<?php
class MyClass { }

// int
$a[0] = 5;

// real
$a[1] = 5.5;

// string
$a[2] = "sdasdas";
$a[3] = "43";

// bool
$a[4] = true;
$a[5] = false;

// null
$a[6] = null;

// class
$a[7] = new MyClass();

// array
$a[8] = array(3, 3, 4);
$a[9] = array("sdfs", "dsfa", "dsfdsa");

$operands = array("===", "!==", "==", "!=", "<", "<=", ">", ">=", "||", "&&", "or", "and", "xor", "|", "&", "\^", ".", "+", "-", "*", "/", "%", "<<", ">>");


foreach ($a as $lhs) {
	foreach ($a as $rhs) {
		foreach ($operands as $operand) {
			// echo gettype($lhs) . " " . $operand . " " . gettype($rhs) . "\n";
			eval ("gettype(\$lhs $operand \$rhs);");
			echo "\n";
		}
		
	}
}
 
?>

Display a default debug "Notice" when the debug-error code is out of bounds.
